comment: For some reason when I look at objects or people I think about the colors. What color is it

well sounds like a fun wait

Then there's a week of exam boards
Then I know whether I actually passed or not.

I like a shot of whiskey every once in a while however
really depends on the gin. most of them are quite bitter
but this one is freakin good. japanese gin

we also got some more of the adventurers and more nib nab

that was before i even joyned the stream chat i think

none of them has been very helpful
if you have a system like a pendulum, what do you call a device that is able to stabilize it in the upright position?
like a pendulum on a sled
but you get what i mean?
would be interesting what the proper english word was tho
ima ask one of my profs sometime
our script is in german so no help there
how's your halo thing doing anyway?
Well I can finally get back to it tomorrow
But I am now terrified of that Raine Ref redraw
Because of how I might get the eyes wrong
If I get the head wrong in the body view, it throws everything else off.
how about you just try to redraw her in the style that you see and like her in
That style is almost completely Tom's style.#
I can throw in some little touches, yes,
But I definitely don't want to go for hyperrealism with her.
That being said...in my sketches for my OCs, they've steadily become more lifelike in expression.
then i would fit her into that
Also, is that an RvB Reference?
nope still haven't seen that yeet
"I don't know what I am. But I do know this. I'm more than just a copy of you...I'm better than you."
You'll understand the line when you see it
i made a remake of kda pop stars (don't ask why that song. i don't know). i decided not to go for a 1:1 copy but to aim for something that would sound good. still proud of the mixdown
I want to make sure that she looks right for her character and that she melds in with the others
meaning i would not go for a 1:1 tom raine
Well, it's not likely to be 1:1
Luke Adams for example, is a bit...Flamboyant.
As in...uses a banshee bomb as a catapult flamboyant.
Was that the one I said my sister was doing?
you haven't told me the name yet so ima go with yes
Because we couldn't do that because none of us knew the rules.
nope you said you were working on one as far as i remember
But I'm now with a Black Crusade group
We haven't met up in a bit
But next Friday we have a game
That tomorrow, I want to take a picture of some of the sketches I've done opver the past few months
Just to show that it's not just a load of hot air
And maybe draw a new one
I know who's going to be who as well
Thomas'll be the Heavy, Leader and Engineer.
Luke'll be the Jack-of-all-stats, Linguist and Technician
Raine'll be the sniper, CQC expert (Knife to meet ya) and AI host
(Which is where AI Red'll come in. I'll give them a coat so they're not too much like Cortana)
In fact, maybe I should do a sketch of the whole gang tomorrow...
I mean the ref sheets aren't all ready but to heck with it
did some sketches as well in the last few months
me as well i meant xD
i should really stop to abrieviate my sentences to death

you said you changed your da?
I had to pay for core membership to change the name
I just wanted it to match my username everywhere else.
And "Incoming-101"...I came up with that when I was 14. I'm embarrased by it now.
you don't wanna know the name i came up with when i created my first youtube profile
Our three cats at my aunt's are growing nicely
And Cinder and Cloud are accustoming themselves to people.
But I haven't seen them in a bit
i would love to have a cat as well
They're hard at work on the farm
i actually know a guy named Pixel
his mom went through the process of getting the name approved and honestly it's not even a bad name
it's his second so he could still go with his first one if he wanted
I don't think i would call my kid pixel but it's a neat name for a cat
also computer engineer so there's that
One of my names is from my father's middle names
My first name is after one of the Irish Saints and a school freind my dad had.
I've decided one thing about SCP-TeapotOfDoom
My parents just went for something rare that's a nice name
so I'm pretty happy with mine
It can suck when everyone else has the same name you do
like so many people are named katharina or a vaiant thereof
Where I am there are a lot of Dylans/Dillons
also it would be funny if TPOD could be dangerous in just one completly unlikely situation
In fact I was told that before my brother was born, my mum considerd calling him Dillon (if they were a boy)
Then, I'm told my dad saw an angsty mum draggin her kid along the road with that name
And he said "We're not having a dylan!
So my brother has a much nicer name instead.
I'm going to log off for the night. Make some tea, clear the bed, listen to music, read Twokinds...

Why do I want to get out of retail?
The gas station where I work at, corporate mandates that managers schedule themselves for at LEAST 48 hours a week
Totally screams "Make a living here" to all potential employees ;)
a gas station is no way to make money

One of the only upsides is that now we sell beer, and people have actually been cool about it
No drunkards, maybe some griping about needing to see ID, but overall compliant and runs smoothly
